page.title: 14CHILDREN'S FOOD AND T.V.
page.content: In winter we have a{cooked break- {fast}with{bacon}or{sausage}but in summer we have {cereal}and{biscuits.} Nearly all the children stay at school for dinner. Some children bring{sand- {wiches, fruit and crisps}from home. The others have{meat or fish}with {vegetables}or{salad,}and{pudding.}At {tea-time,}we all have something hot like{pies}or{beefburgers}with{cakes}or {biscuits }to follow. We have a{drink before we go to bed. We cannot eat {sweets}in school but everyone has sweets or crisps after school. We all watch{television}and listen to{pop {music}on{Radio 1. }Our favourite television programmes are{quizzes}and {cartoons. }Half of us have a television in our bedroom and more than half of us have a{video}at home.
